turns.user_message: I've been a victim of a robbery. Can you help me?
turns.agent_response: Sure! I think you'll need the police. Their contact number is 01223358966.
turns.reasoning: First turn - user reports robbery and needs help. Agent provides police contact. This is Goal 1.
Follow-up question about same topic (police department). Continues Goal 1.
User expressing gratitude for help with robbery/police info. Concludes Goal 1.
